entry.title: Research Presentation@SASIMI2024
entry.content:
A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at SASIMI2024 in Taipei, Taiwan.

  1. Takuto ANDO, Yusuke INOUE, “FPGA Implementation of a DPU-Based Facial Expression Recognition System,” The 25th Workshop on Synthesis And System Integration of Mixed Information technologies, Taipei, Taiwan, Mar, 2024.
entry.summary: A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at SASIMI2024 in Taipei, Taiwan.

entry.title: Graduation Research Presentation (2023)
entry.content:
Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

Advanced Cource Students

  • ABE Koki
    • Proteus Effect of School Uniform Avatars in VR Space
  • ONO Tatsuya
    • Detection of Leaf Branching on Leek Leaves Using YOLOX

5th Year Studens

  • Oka Naoki
    • Effectiveness of DPU in Segmentation for Autonomous Driving
  • Shono Jun
    • Evaluation of YOLOv8 Model Performance and Shape Information in Locating Small Green Onion Branch
  • Hida Yusei
    • Visualization of citrus tanning in 3D virtual space
entry.summary: Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

entry.title: Studnet Presentation@Kyushu Section, IEICE
entry.content:
Our lab students gave presentation at Kyushu Section, IEICE.

  1. 小野竜也, 井上優良, “YOLOX を用いた白ねぎの葉の分岐部検出”, 2023年度（第31回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-22 Sep, 2023年
  2. 阿部光希, 井上優良, “VR 空間上の学生服アバターにおけるプロテウス効果”, 2023年度（第31回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-11, Sep, 2023年
  3. 安藤拓翔, 井上 優良, “FPGA によるリアルタイム表情認識システムの実装”, 2023年度（第31回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, A-15, Sep, 2023年
entry.summary: Our lab students gave presentation at Kyushu Section, IEICE.

entry.content:

entry.title: Online Studnet Presentation@Kyushu Section, IEICE
entry.content:
Our lab students gave online presentation at Kyushu Section, IEICE.

  1. 松下 晴南, 井上 優良, “LRFを用いた粒子フィルタにおける線分交差判定のGPU実装による高速化”, 2022年度（第30回）電子情報通信会九州支部学生会講演会, D-02, Sep, 2022.
  2. 植野 優磨, 井上 優良, “GANによるマスク無し顔画像生成の検討”, 2022年度（第30回）電子情報通信会九州支部学生会講演会, D-34, Sep, 2022.
  3. 廣瀬 花菜子, 井上 優良, 嶋田 浩和, “ほ場画像セグメンテーションのための色空間の検討”, 2022年度（第30回）電子情報通信会九州支部学生会講演会, D-39, Sep, 2022.
